vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Ft Myers Gulf Coast
title: Comfortable Fort Myers Hotel with Onsite Restaurant, Outdoor Pool & Lakeside Patio
description: Experience the sun-kissed charm of Florida with a stay at Crowne Plaza Ft. Myers Gulf Coast, an IHG Hotel. This lakeside hotel offers a tranquil retreat, with a sparkling outdoor pool and onsite dining at Oasis Restaurant and Bar. Just a short drive away, discover the Edison and Ford Winter Estates or indulge in fresh seafood at a bustling waterfront restaurant. For a taste of the wild, visit the nearby Six Mile Cypress Slough Preserve, a haven for local wildlife.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Ft. Myers Gulf Coast, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 9931 Interstate Commerce Dr, Fort Myers, FL 33913, United States
